author: tbenr
content: We currently implemented a change where we always call with committeeIndex set to 0. Which means that we call it once even if we have validators in different committees

author: nflaig
content:
We had a committee grouping optimization already pre-electra in Lodestar and only called this api once with index 0, then on the vc side mutated the data with the correct index before signing and submitting the attestations.

As per spec the bn should already ignore the index and always set it to 0
> For `slot`s in Electra and later, this AttestationData must have a `committee_index` of 0.

we can still add the note from your PR though

author: tbenr
content: i think it worth it in case on the BN side someone uses that param to do something else before putting 0 in the attestationData

author: tbenr
content: so it will be well known that the param wont be indicative of the actual committee
